examples: By the end of his reign, the vast empire was in decline.
Al final de su reinado, el vasto imperio estaba en decadencia.
The house was built during the reign of Henry VIII.
La casa fue construida durante el reinado de Enrique VIII.
Sir Alex Ferguson's reign at Manchester United
El reinado de Sir Alex Ferguson en el Manchester United
The story only came out during the final days of his reign as Chief Executive.
La historia solo salió a la luz durante los últimos días de su reinado como director ejecutivo.
